About JEP Heroes

 

JEP Heroes delivers heroic services in the area of outsourced technical support, customer service and e-commerce support. Our employees (Heroes) help our clients in reducing their operating expenses, make their customers smile and improve revenue.

Customer Support is not just an operational cost. It is an unique opportunity to increase revenue.

The owners of JEP Heroes have a long track-record in the area of (multi-lingual) outsourced customer support and e-commerce. We know what it takes to create happy customers and improve online conversion rates using smart technology and well trained employees.

 

JEP Heroes is based in Nis (Serbia) where a large pool of well educated and multi-lingual employees are available at attractive costs.

Emile Koolstra (Sales)

Emile has fulfilled several senior management positions in the outsourced customer service industry and as such was responsible for the operations of large contact centers, servicing clients as Philips and Logitech. As founder of Younify, an e-commerce development agency, he is an expert when it comes to support online shops and helping them grow their revenue.

Jelena holds a degree from the Faculty of Electrical Engineering (Telecommunications) and has over 15 years of development experience. She is a Magento Commerce certified developer with extensive knowledge of e-commerce platforms.
